chinese: 更多的研究生培训通常需要在大学学习结束后进行。
english: More graduate training is often needed after the university study is finished.

chinese: 他被任命为文化部长被视为降职。
english: His appointment as the Minister of Culture was seen as a demotion.

chinese: 部落竞相建造单体雕像。
english: Tribes vied with each other to build up monolithic statues.

chinese: 食物已成为世界政治问题。
english: Food has become a political issue in the world.

chinese: 良好的营养对一般健康和活力至关重要。
english: Good nutrition is crucial to the general health and vitality.

chinese: 速度被定义为物体或人移动的快慢程度。
english: Speed is defined as how quickly an object or a person moves.

chinese: 时间和距离被用来计算速度。
english: Time and distance are used to calculate speed.

chinese: 你不需要专业知识就能读这本书。
english: You don't need to have specialist knowledge to be able to read the book.
